name: gpw_v3_density
title: Population Density (GPW V3, UN Adjusted)
description: Population density (UN Adjusted values) from Gridded Population of the World v3. GPWv3 depicts the density of human population across the globe. Source data provided in 2.5 arc-minute grid cells.
details: No additional processing of raw data.

extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average population density per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum population density per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum population density per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University, and Centro Internacional de Agricultura Tropical - CIAT. 2005. Gridded Population of the World, Version 3 (GPWv3): Population Density Grid. Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4XK8CG2.
